description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, deva, Channel Divinity class feature

Benefit: Your Channel Divinity powers that have a range of personal gain a range of close burst 5, enabling you to target yourself or one ally within the burst. If the power has a trigger, you or the ally can trigger the power, but the triggering creature must also be the power's target.

Published in Dragon Magazine 374, page(s) 50.
